MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: GDXDM.TRC_PSTN_SNAP_REL table hold Reconciliation position snapshot relationship for each vendor
MAPPING.NAME: m_SCD_TRC_PSTN_SNAP_REL

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Check if source row exist in target table a) if present then compare the column values of source and target. If there is a difference then set CHANGE_FLAG = 1 to denote it as changed record else CHANGE_FLAG = 0 b) If not present then set NEW_FLAG=1 to denote as new record.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Exp_Set_New_Changed_flags

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(NOT ISNULL(Tgt_RCNCLN_PSTN_ID) AND NOT ISNULL(Tgt_SNAP_ID) AND NOT ISNULL(Tgt_CORP_OWNR_ID) AND (Tgt_RCNCLN_ID!=Src_RCNCLN_ID or Tgt_RCNCLN_STUS_CD!=Src_RCNCLN_STUS_CD or Tgt_RCNCLN_PSTN_ACT_IN!=Src_RCNCLN_PSTN_ACT_IN or Tgt_RCNCLN_PSTN_ACT_DT!=var_RCNCLN_PSTN_ACT_DT),1, 0 )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: Changed_Flag

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Route input records to two outputs - New and Changed, based on New and Changed flags. When New Flag =1then record is inserted into the target TRBI table. When Changed Flag= 1then record is updated into the target TRBI table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Rtr_New_Changed_Rows

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION:
Extract records for timestamp>'$$LOAD_LAST_TS'. Initial value of parameter $$LOAD_LAST_TS is '1111-01-01 00:00:00.000000' and is get updated with MAX(UPDT_TS) value on each successful run.
BSR21 - When there a Pending void (12) and Merge (14) action done on a recon of Position type for the current snapshot, there will not be any summary created or requested. Only change will be on the Recon header table so a separate SQL is written to fetch this change based on LAST_UPDT_TS of HDR table.
AND VRAP.TSNAP.SNAP_SEQ_NB = -1 And VRAP TSNAP.SNAP_ID= VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_ID – This is added to make sure it is happening only for the CURRENT snapshots
Not including the condition vrap.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_STAT_CD=1 since all inactive ind(0) are consider as invalid data and not used in BI reports.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_Source_Records

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the corresponding RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE summary sequence number, generated
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: RECN_SUMM_GID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the corresponding TSNAP.SNAP_ID for the Recon snapshot
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: SNAP_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the status for the Recon snapshot summary. If it is current and not be
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: SNAP_STAT_CD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT RECN_SUMM_GID, SNAP_ID, CORP_CD, RECN_GID, RECN_STAT_CD, SNAP_STAT_CD, INSRT_TS FROM (SELECT DISTINCT VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.RECN_SUMM_GID, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_ID, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.CORP_CD, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_GID, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR.RECN_STAT_CD, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_STAT_CD, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.INSRT_TS FROM VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL WHERE VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.UPDT_TS > TIMESTAMP ('$$LOAD_LAST_TS') AND VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_SUMM_TYP_CD = 1 AND VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.RECN_SUMM_GID = VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_SUMM_GID AND VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_GID = VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR.RECN_GID UNION SELECT DISTINCT VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.RECN_SUMM_GID, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_ID, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.CORP_CD, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_GID, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR.RECN_STAT_CD, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_STAT_CD, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.INSRT_TS FROM VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR, VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE, VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL, VRAP.TSNAP WHERE VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR.LAST_UPDT_TS > TIMESTAMP ('$$LOAD_LAST_TS') AND VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR.RECN_STAT_CD IN (12,14) AND VRAP.TSNAP.SNAP_SEQ_NB = -1 AND VRAP.TSNAP.SNAP_ID = VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_ID AND VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_SUMM_TYP_CD = 1 AND VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.RECN_SUMM_GID = VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_SUMM_GID AND VRAP.RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE.RECN_GID = VRAP.RCNT_RECN_HDR.RECN_GID) ORDER BY SNAP_ID

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup on TRC_PSTN_SNAP_REL, To check this table for new records to insert from source and update recorts based on the lookup conditions.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: Lkp_TRC_PSTN_SNAP_REL

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the corresponding RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE summary sequence number, generated
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: in_RCNCLN_PSTN_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This is the corresponding TSNAP.SNAP_ID for the Recon snapshot
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: in_SNAP_ID

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: RCNCLN_PSTN_ID = in_RCNCLN_PSTN_ID AND SNAP_ID = in_SNAP_ID AND CORP_OWNR_ID = in_CORP_OWNR_ID

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Check if source row exist in target table a) if present then compare the column values of source and target. If there is a difference then set CHANGE_FLAG = 1 to denote it as changed record else CHANGE_FLAG = 0 b) If not present then set NEW_FLAG=1 to denote as new record.
INSTANCE.NAME: Exp_Set_New_Changed_flags

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Route input records to two outputs - New and Changed, based on New and Changed flags. When New Flag =1then record is inserted into the target TRBI table. When Changed Flag= 1then record is updated into the target TRBI table.
INSTANCE.NAME: Rtr_New_Changed_Rows

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION:
Extract records for timestamp>'$$LOAD_LAST_TS'. Initial value of parameter $$LOAD_LAST_TS is '1111-01-01 00:00:00.000000' and is get updated with MAX(UPDT_TS) value on each successful run.
BSR21 - When there a Pending void (12) and Merge (14) action done on a recon of Position type for the current snapshot, there will not be any summary created or requested. Only change will be on the Recon header table so a separate SQL is written to fetch this change based on LAST_UPDT_TS of HDR table.
AND VRAP.TSNAP.SNAP_SEQ_NB = -1 And VRAP TSNAP.SNAP_ID= VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_ID – This is added to make sure it is happening only for the CURRENT snapshots
Not including the condition vrap.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL.SNAP_STAT_CD=1 since all inactive ind(0) are consider as invalid data and not used in BI reports.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_Source_Records

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Lookup on TRC_PSTN_SNAP_REL, To check this table for new records to insert from source and update recorts based on the lookup conditions.
INSTANCE.NAME: Lkp_TRC_PSTN_SNAP_REL

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: This table is used for storing the RECN_SUMM_GID for the Recon snapshot, for the Recon Position (RCNT_RECN_EXTN_CLM) to be recorded in TRBI database.
SHORTCUT.NAME: TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL
